com.mpos.lottery.te.sequence.domain

类 TicketSerialSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpos.lottery.te.sequence.domain.TicketSerialSpec

  • public class TicketSerialSpec
extends java.lang.Object
    According to the customer, the serial No. or reference No. should be added with randomness as below:

    OYDHGHDYGMDMXXXXXXZZ

    where

    • O - Online or offline mode.
    • YY - year
    • DDD - day of year
    • GG - game type or second in minute, it depends client is requesting serial No. or reference No.
    • HH - hour of day
    • MM - minute of hour
    • XXXXXX - sequential number
    • ZZ - random number

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TicketSerialSpec

        public TicketSerialSpec(int saleMode,
                java.util.Date timestamp,
                int gameTypeOrSecond,
                java.math.BigInteger sequence)
        Construct a ticket serial number by given elements.
        参数:
        saleMode - online or offline?
        timestamp - The timestamp used to generate time information in serial No.
        gameTypeOrSecond - the game type of a ticket.
        sequence - The sequential number.

      • TicketSerialSpec

        public TicketSerialSpec(java.lang.String serialNo)
                 throws ApplicationException
        De-construct a ticket serial number.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
